projects.title: Historic University Building - Salt Lake City
projects.description: Multi-story rope access exclusion work on a historic brick university building. Sealed numerous entry points along roof lines and window areas while preserving architectural integrity.

images.alt: Historic brick university building exterior work
images.caption: Professional rope access work on multi-story historic building

images.alt: Technician sealing entry points on brick building
images.caption: Detailed sealing work around window areas and brick gaps

images.alt: Roof access work on tile roof
images.caption: Safe roof access techniques for comprehensive exclusion work
Professional work on historic building tile roof system

projects.title: Log Home with Metal Roof - Park City Area
projects.description: Comprehensive exclusion work on a beautiful log home with metal roofing. Addressed roof ridge and eave entry points while maintaining the rustic aesthetic.

images.caption: Precision work on metal roof ridge and peak areas
Professional sealing techniques for metal roofing systems
Careful attention to roof ridge sealing details

images.alt: Log home with green metal roof
images.caption: Beautiful log home requiring specialized exclusion techniques

projects.title: Modern Townhome Complex - Lehi
projects.description: Coordinated exclusion work across multiple connected townhome units. Systematic approach ensuring complete coverage of all potential entry points.

images.caption: Modern townhome complex requiring systematic exclusion approach

images.alt: Roof line exclusion work on townhomes
images.caption: Professional roof line sealing on modern construction
Detailed eave and soffit exclusion work from ground level

projects.title: Commercial High-Rise - Downtown Salt Lake
projects.description: Challenging high-rise exclusion work using advanced rope access techniques. Sealed entry points on busy downtown commercial buildings.

images.caption: Advanced rope access techniques for high-rise exclusion work
Professional rappelling work on modern commercial building

projects.title: Mountain Log Home - Alpine
projects.description: Exclusion work on a rustic mountain log home with green metal roofing. Required specialized techniques for log construction and metal roof systems.

images.caption: Scenic mountain log home requiring specialized exclusion approach
Interior exclusion work in exposed log beam construction

projects.title: Historic Brick Building Complex
